items.text: back of a length outside off, but skidding through to the keeper. Shadab offers no shot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and Shadab walks across to the off side. Drills a punch off the back foot to cover, but can't pinch the single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full on off, and he pushes at this off the front foot. The ball's come off the bat's sweet spot, and beats mid on. Shadab gets off the mark
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shadab Khan, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle stump, and he defends off the front foot. The ball trickles away to mid on
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and flicked off the hips to deep backward square
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: full on off stump, and Imam takes a big stride forward to defend
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and Imam taps this with soft hands to point for a quick single
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: overpitched just outside off stump. Shadab keeps his eyes on the ball and fends this with soft hands. Almost a yorker
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and Shadab tries to cut this square. Bottom-edges it towards point
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: tossed up just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: flighted full on off stump. Shadab carefully taps this to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: overpitched on middle stump, and this has been wedged to cover. Shadab wants the single, but sharp work in the field ensures he must scamper back into the crease
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full on leg, and spinning further in. Defended to mid on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and turning into Shadab. Punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and the confident-looking drive is stopped by the diving cover fielder
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: good length on off, and angling into his pads. Worked off his hips to square leg for a single
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he covers his stumps to defend off the back foot
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he clips this smartly off his toes to midwicket. But can't seem to find the gap at all
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and driven with soft hands to mid off. But cover runs to his right and intercepts the ball
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg and rolls away to midwicket
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: good length on the fourth-stump line, and his back-foot punch takes the outside edge to third man. Bangladesh won't mind since that puts Shadab back on strike for the next over
items.postText: Salman: "Looks good to see Mashrafe back on the field. He is a true fighter!"
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shadab Khan, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and he drives through the front foot. Stopped by Soumya at cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and spinning into his legs. Pushed to the leg side
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and the expansive cover drive is sharply stopped by Soumya. He then has a shy at the bowler's stumps, but misses the direct hit. Imam would've been gone if that hit!
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shadab Khan, no run
